titleInfo.title: Conversational agents need to be ‘attentive speakers’ to receive conversational feedback from human interlocutors

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Buschmeier, H., Kopp, S.: Conversational agents need to be ‘attentive speakers’ to receive conversational feedback from human interlocutors. Presented at the 5th European Symposium on Multimodal Communication, Bielefeld, Germany (2017).
